preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: The goal of Seam Social is to provide CDI components to access some of the social network services. It is focused on OAuth 1.0 and 2.0 services. At least Seam Social provides a way to get one's profile for a given service. There are services like Twitter for which Seam Social provides a lot of model object to manage timeline and friends in the service.

Seam social was created with genericity and polymorphism concepts in minds allowing users to deal with a collection of OAuth sessions, it also allows you to create your own extension to connect to an OAuth server.
